typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as double,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as boolean,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as double,
		delinq_2yrs as double,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as double,
		mths_since_last_delinq as double,
		mths_since_last_record as double,
		open_acc as double,
		pub_rec as double,
		revol_bal as double,
		revol_util as double,
		total_acc as double,
		initial_list_status as boolean,
		out_prncp as double,
		out_prncp_inv as double,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as double,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as double,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as double,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as double,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string,
		skid as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionColumn: 'id',
	partitionBy('external', 64)) ~> source1
source(output(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as double,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as boolean,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as string,
		delinq_2yrs as string,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as string,
		mths_since_last_delinq as string,
		mths_since_last_record as string,
		open_acc as string,
		pub_rec as string,
		revol_bal as string,
		revol_util as string,
		total_acc as string,
		initial_list_status as string,
		out_prncp as string,
		out_prncp_inv as string,
		total_pymnt as string,
		total_pymnt_inv as string,
		total_rec_prncp as string,
		total_rec_int as string,
		total_rec_late_fee as string,
		recoveries as string,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as string,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as string,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as string,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as string,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as double,
		total_bal_il as double,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as double,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as double,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 aggregate(groupBy(mycols = sha2(256,columns())),
	each(match(true()), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctRows
source2, DistinctRows join(source2@id == DistinctRows@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
DistinctRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true) ~> sink1
DistinctRows sink(input(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as double,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as boolean,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as double,
		delinq_2yrs as double,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as double,
		mths_since_last_delinq as double,
		mths_since_last_record as double,
		open_acc as double,
		pub_rec as double,
		revol_bal as double,
		revol_util as double,
		total_acc as double,
		initial_list_status as boolean,
		out_prncp as double,
		out_prncp_inv as double,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as double,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as double,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as double,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as double,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 80,
		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2

source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> taxiSource
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> movieSource
source(output(
		id as string,
		member_id as string,
		loan_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt_inv as string,
		term as string,
		int_rate as string,
		installment as string,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as string,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as string,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as string,
		delinq_2yrs as string,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as string,
		mths_since_last_delinq as string,
		mths_since_last_record as string,
		open_acc as string,
		pub_rec as string,
		revol_bal as string,
		revol_util as string,
		total_acc as string,
		initial_list_status as string,
		out_prncp as string,
		out_prncp_inv as string,
		total_pymnt as string,
		total_pymnt_inv as string,
		total_rec_prncp as string,
		total_rec_int as string,
		total_rec_late_fee as string,
		recoveries as string,
		collection_recovery_fee as string,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as string,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as string,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as string,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as string,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> loans
taxiSource derive(month = split(pickup_datetime,'-')[2],
		year = split(pickup_datetime,'-')[1],
		day = split(split(pickup_datetime,' ')[1],'-')[3]) ~> decompdatetime
loans window(over(loan_status),
	asc(loan_amnt, true),
	parts = nTile(20)) ~> Window1
Window1 derive(parts = 'part'+toString(parts)) ~> DerivedColumn1
movieSource select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
decompdatetime sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year,
		month,
		day
	)) ~> taxiSink
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year
	)) ~> movieSink
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	filePattern:'loans[n].parquet',
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		parts
	)) ~> loansSink

transformations.name: Myprojection
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'myfilename',
	partitionRootPath: 'partdata',
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['partdata/**/**/*.parquet']) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(Title = reverse(Title)) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 derive(MovieIdDupe = toInteger(byName('MovieIdDupe')),
		ActionDupe = toString(byName('ActionDupe')),
		MovieId = toInteger(byName('MovieId')),
		Title = toString(byName('Title')),
		Genre = toString(byName('Genre')),
		Year = toInteger(byName('Year')),
		Rating = toInteger(byName('Rating')),
		RottenTom = toInteger(byName('RottenTom')),
		Action = toString(byName('Action')),
		releaseyear = toInteger(byName('releaseyear')),
		Month = toInteger(byName('Month'))) ~> Myprojection
Myprojection filter(releaseyear == 2019) ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		releaseyear,
		Month
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> movies
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> taxiSource
Filter1 derive(movie = '999979',
		title = 'Mark Story') ~> DerivedColumn1
movies filter(title == 'Toy Story') ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
taxiSource derive(month = split(pickup_datetime,'-')[2],
		year = toInteger(split(pickup_datetime,'-')[1])+1,
		day = split(split(pickup_datetime,' ')[1],'-')[3]) ~> decompdatetime
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year
	)) ~> sink1
decompdatetime sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year,
		month,
		day
	)) ~> taxiSink
